roleset.name: to preserve, economize
roleset.note: CONSERVE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'conserve' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from conserve.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: In the past , [the socialist policies of the government]-1 strictly limited the size of new steel mills , petrochemical plants , car factories and other industrial concerns [*]-1 to conserve resources and restrict the profits [0] businessmen could make [*T*-1] .
